item.title: Updating Resources Custom Field values using CSOM, Project Online, #Project Server 2013
item.description: Project Online applications need to be written using CSOM or OData rather the PSI which will be deprecated soon. The CSOM - Client-side object model implements common server functionality. If you are not familiar with development in Project Server 2013 refer to the links below to learn about CSOM, OData, JSOM. ProjectData - Project 2013 OData service reference https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/jj163015(v=office.15).aspx Client-side object model (CSOM) for Project 2013 https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/jj163123(v=office.15).aspx What the CSOM does and does not do https://msdn.
